page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5ws_Add_Group(C group_name [,* Localrequest ])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The group was added. .F. = The group was not added. The Result_Flag will be .F. if the group name already exists.

argument.name: group_name
argument.description: The name of the new security group to be added.

argument.name: Localrequest
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. It is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.

page.description: Add a group to the list of security groups for the current project. 'Request' pointer must be provided if run in web page.
page.discussion: The A5WS_Add_Group() adds a security group to the web security system with the name supplied in group_name. If the group value was not added or already exists, the Result_Flag will return 'False'. Request is added automatically by the server when run from a web page. Limitations: Web applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example attempts to add a group using the group name.

see.ref: Adds a security group to the web security system
